name: Buff.AttackDice
remarks: Creates and returns a new buff that modifies Attack Dice.

input.name: delta
input.desc: the modification in dice, may be positive or negative

input.name: duration
input.desc: number of combat rounds during which the buff remains active

output.desc: a new instance of the requested buff
